last_episode_to_air.name: The Insider's Tour
last_episode_to_air.overview: Welcome Aboard! Keel-to-Bridge Tour, Surrender Deck, 16-inch Gun Turret, Combat Engagement Center, Captain's Quarters.

name: Mighty Mo: Battleship USS Missouri BB-63
original_name: Mighty Mo: Battleship USS Missouri BB-63
overview: This is THE HISTORY THE WORLD'S MOST FAMOUS BATTLESHIP--the USS Missouri BB-63--as told firsthand by the people who know her best--the officers and men of Mighty MO. Through recent on-board interviews and never-before-seen footage, this three volume documentary takes you through 50 years and three wars, from the ship's first commissioning during WWII to the Japanese surrender in Tokyo Bay, from the Korean War bombardments and Gulf War missile attacks to her final farewell at Pearl Harbor.
